column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Been wanting to try this place for a while and was pleasantly surprised!  Went there on a first date and the high tops in the bar area were the perfect spot for that.  Goat cheese was great
column2: cocktails were great!  Only downside was that the burger which looked great was over cooked and and fries were cold and soggy.  It was busy
column3: that by the time I was able to get anyone's attention
column4: I didn't even want hot fries.  I will probably be back to try it again next time I am in the mood for a steak!
